text: Karle Warren (born February 8, 1992) is an American actress, known for her portrayal as Lauren Cassidy, the daughter of Judge Amy Gray, on the CBS hit drama, Judging Amy. She lives in Los Angeles with her mother and younger brother, Justin. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Film and television |- ! Year ! Title !
